channel.title: How To Add Wilderness Levels?
channel.description:
Hey guys,
need some help on how to add wilderness lvls in the wilderness iv found no tuts on google, mopar or rune s
does anyone know of a tut? anywhere..? or can give some details here .. whould be much appreciated
BTW im using winterlove.

item.title: How To Add Wilderness Levels?
item.dc:creator: @lewis2 lewis`
item.description:
@lewis2 wrote:

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:4, topic:260662”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=344216.msg2656916#msg2656916 date=1233938323]
Really not that hard. I don’t know how previous Wildy levels have been coded, but if i were to ever do it, it would just be the same thing as the boolean nonWild, or something similar to it.

declare:
public int wildLevel;

declare:
if (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431) {
wildLevel = 1;
}

Start your sendquest:
String wildL “”;

if (wildLevel = 1) {
wildL = “1”;

sendQuest("" +wildLevel);

etc.
[/quote]
That would result in masses of unneeded lines of code.[/quote]

you have a better idea?

Read full topic
